name: Matthias Wimmer
bio: Professionally I do embedded programming in a mixture of C and Rust code. Coding in Clojure and 10+ years Java before. I couldn't apply Haskell directly at work so far, but feel how it influenced my way of programming in other languages as well.

name: Mats Rauhala
bio: Working with Haskell at work for the past couple of years. Before that a Haskell hobbyist for 10 or so years.
